tool_description: Identifies traffic bottlenecks in the network by analyzing flow capacity ratios and detecting points where traffic flow is significantly constrained.

flow_data.description: Traffic flow data from Traffic Flow Calculator

network_topology.description: Network topology identifier from Road Network Loader

capacity_threshold.description: Capacity utilization threshold (0.7-0.95) above which bottlenecks are identified

error_messages: Invalid flow data: flow_data array cannot be empty and must contain numeric values
Network topology not found: Specified network_topology identifier does not exist
Invalid capacity threshold: capacity_threshold must be between 0.7 and 0.95
Analysis failed: Unable to identify bottlenecks from provided flow and network data
usage: Input flow_data and network_topology from previous tools, optionally adjust capacity_threshold. Returns identified bottleneck locations with severity metrics.

severity_scores.description: Severity scores for each bottleneck from 0 to 1

capacity_utilization.description: Capacity utilization ratios for each bottleneck location

total_bottlenecks.description: Total number of bottlenecks identified in the network
